lessonDescription: [WIP] A very brief introduction to views.

lessonScreens.screenMd:
JOINs can get complicated and require an understanding of the data model. If ever in doubt, get someone familiar with the data model to build a view.

Not much of an exercise here, except to show that views are like tables. Except convenient.

Maybe we could introduce all the different views at the different levels 

- vw_pizza_order
- vw_pizza_order_line
